typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{OETireSize } as string,
		LoadRange as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SrcOEForecastLoadRange
source(output(
		OETireSize as string,
		LoadRange as string,
		Updated_Date as timestamp,
		Inserted_Date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RefDimOEFORECASTLOADRANGE
SrcOEForecastLoadRange, RefDimOEFORECASTLOADRANGE join({OETireSize } == OETireSize,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinOEtireSize
JoinOEtireSize split(equals({OETireSize }, OETireSize),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(ConSplitUpd, ConSplitIns)
ConditionalSplit1@ConSplitUpd alterRow() ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 derive(Updated_Date = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerColUpd
ConditionalSplit1@ConSplitIns derive(Inserted_Date = currentTimestamp(),
		Updated_Date = '9999-12-31 00:00:00') ~> DerColIns
DerColIns sink(input(
		OETireSize as string,
		LoadRange as string,
		Updated_Date as timestamp,
		Inserted_Date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['set identity_insert  OE_Forecast_Loadrange on'],
	postSQLs:['set identity_insert  OE_Forecast_Loadrange off'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SnkDimOEFORECASTLOADRANGEIns
DerColUpd sink(input(
		OETireSize as string,
		LoadRange as string,
		Updated_Date as timestamp,
		Inserted_Date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['OETireSize '],
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['set identity_update OE_Forecast_Loadrange on'],
	postSQLs:['set identity_update OE_Forecast_Loadrange off'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SnkDimOEFORECASTLOADRANGEUpd
